item.title: LHC Group Inc 10-K
item.description: LHC Group Inc, which is in the Services-Home Health Care Services [8082] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 22, 2023 had 43465 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 398 instances 2022 - 322 instances care - 318 instances services - 317 instances 1 - 292 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
